FuncDef: The test connectivity abort command ends an enhanced PRBS test on a low-speed interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface type.
The value can be a serial or trunk serial interface.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To end an over-long enhanced PRBS test, run the test connectivity abort command. The command configuration does not take effect on tests that start using the test connectivity interface standing command.
